summary.span: 为用于呈现 ASP.NET 移动控件的所有 对象提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for all objects used for rendering ASP.NET mobile controls.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类及其继承的类提供服务和适配器，以执行呈现的帮助器方法。The class and its inherited classes provide services and helper methods for adapters to perform rendering.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .
